https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kt8VyFHNc7r09Vv9QLuszkqv5Yp.jpg A wealthy factory owner, played by Amitabh Bachchan, raises up his conniving son-in-law while breaking off with his own son, played by Akshay Kumar, who then comes back to right all wrongs and save the family fortune.
